document.full_text: u.s. district judge susan richard nelson said she would take 'a couple of weeks' to decide whether to grant the players' request for an injunction.
document.title: at n.f.l. hearing, judge urges, but doesn't compel, a return to talks
lines_and_colors: u.s. district judge susan richard nelson said she would take 'a couple of weeks' to decide whether to grant the players' request for an injunction.
